rdf:Description.dc:title: For all of our futures : strategies for the future of post-secondary education in Alberta : report 1992 strategies for the future of post-secondary education in Alberta : report /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Strategic Options Task Force.
Alberta. Alberta Advanced Education and Career Development.
Alberta. Dept. of Advanced Education.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton] : Alberta Advanced Education and Career Development,
rdf:Description.dc:description: At head of title: Advanced Education and Career Development.
On cover: "Adult learning: access through innovation, supporting documents".

"In August 1992, the Government of Alberta's Department of Advanced Education asked a group of academicians, private sector colleagues and educational planners to look at the future of the post-secondary education system in Alberta in the light of both fiscal and strategic concerns" --Preface.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Postsecondary education
Adult education
Continuing education
Employees
Higher education and state
Manpower policy
